com.autonomy.aci.client.services.impl

Class ErrorProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.autonomy.aci.client.services.impl.AbstractStAXProcessor<AciErrorException>
      • com.autonomy.aci.client.services.impl.ErrorProcessor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Processor<AciErrorException>, StAXProcessor<AciErrorException>, Serializable

    public class ErrorProcessor
extends AbstractStAXProcessor<AciErrorException>
    Processes an ACI Server error response into an AciErrorException.
    See Also:

    • Method Detail

      • process

        public AciErrorException process(javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamReader aciResponse)
        Process the ACI error response into an AciErrorException.
        Specified by:
        process in interface StAXProcessor<AciErrorException>
        Specified by:
        process in class AbstractStAXProcessor<AciErrorException>
        Parameters:
        aciResponse - The ACI response to process
        Returns:
        Does not actually return anything as it throws the exception when it's finished parsing the response.
        Throws:
        AciErrorException - Unless there was an error
        ProcessorException - If an error occurred during the processing of the ACI response
